evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Discussed job search anxiety, presentation nerves, and research paper concerns. Solutions included practicing elevator pitches, reframing career goals, and balancing emotional/analytical data in academic writing. Lisa enthusiastically implemented strategies, securing resume reviews and additional networking opportunities. Progress evidenced by confident interview answers, research paper outline, and successful alumni meetings.

evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Discussed job search anxiety, presentation nerves, academic paper concerns, and reframing personal challenges. Solutions accepted: 1) Practicing presentations with honest peer feedback 2) Structured interview answers combining skills/passion 3) Blending qualitative/quantitative data in academic work 4) Translating roommate conflicts into customer resolution stories. Lisa responded proactively: scheduled alumni meetings, practiced pitches, developed paper framework connecting personal experiences to marketing concepts. Progress evidenced by: 1) Successful coffee chat yielding resume review + new invites 2) Improved '5-year plan' answer incorporating trends 3) Paper outline merging emotional/data-driven approaches 4) Enthusiastic reframing of challenges as professional strengths.
